title: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: When modifying parameters in the dialog details, there are two issues to address. First, there is duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. Second, the first and second column could be merged to improve readability.
OB: Currently, when changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
EB: When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview should display the full name without being cut off.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog
2. Select a parameter
3. Change the parameter name to something very long
4. Observe that the preview is truncated
